Module.Name: Grove Buzzer
Module.Overview: This is a simple yet enjoyable twig to use. The piezo can be connected to digital outputs, and will emit a tone when the output is high. Alternatively it can be connected to an analog pulse-width modulation output to generate various tones and effects.

Register.Name: duty_cycle
Register.Description: This register specifes the on duty cycle as a percentage value between 0 and 100. 0 means totally off and 100 means totally on.

Register.Name: frequency
Register.Description: This register specifes the refresh frequency in Hertz (cycles per second) as a value between 1 and 100. A frequency value of 0 means the LED is off. A value of 1 means the buzzer is cycled at 1 Hertz. A value of 100 means the buzzer is cycled at 100 Hertz.
